Articles.Content:
First of all, signatures only show up for me when I am signed in - a trifle annoying, and the old forums did not work this way.

Secondly, there is no obvious way to add a sig, other than typing it in and pretending it exists. How would I do it properly?
2. Go into your Account Settings, and select the "Signature" tab on the left.
Moving to Kerbal Network, since this is about the forum software rather than the game itself.
